remarks: A Hilbert lattice has the exchange property.  (Contributed by NM, 6-May-2012.)
statement:
hlsuprexch.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
hlsuprexch.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
hlsuprexch.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
hlsuprexch.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
hlexch2 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ X e. B ) /\ -. P .<_ X ) -> ( P .<_ ( Q .\/ X ) -> Q .<_ ( P .\/ X ) ) ) $.
